title: Textile, ca. 1795
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 73cm (28 3/4in)
Weft: 66cm (26in.). Right selv. present. 
Height of repeat: 32 cm (12 5/8in.)
Width of repeat; 29cm (11 1/2in.)
description:
Polychrome pattern of two long-necked birds and a vase, hanging basket and flowers on a black background. 
Straght repeat. Block edges visible.

ca. 1795. Medium: cotton
